name: The Three Little Pigs - Search and find
name_original: The Three Little Pigs - Search and find
description:
You think you know the story of the three little pigs? Well, we're pretty sure you've never experienced such a cool version! OK, you'll find the big bad wolf and the 3 pigs brothers, but you'll have fun during the story, searching for hidden objects in the backgrounds, helping the pigs to build their houses or the wolf to blow them away!

The "Search and find" collection proposes to retell classic tales loved by kids with fun dialogues and mini-games. There are 3 levels of difficulty, so you can begin with the easy mode and when you feel ready, try the medium and the difficult mode, with plenty of hidden objects to discover and puzzles to assemble.

Key Features:
- Read and listen to the classic story of the three little pigs with fun dialogues and interactivity
- Beautiful illustrations and cartoon-like animations
- Play 3 levels of difficulty of hidden objects games and puzzle games
- Chose between english, gerlan and french
- Select a scene with easy-to-use navigation
- Have fun!

If you like "The three little pigs - Search and find", you'll love "Goldilocks - Search and find". And please tell us what classic tale you would like to play with next!
